'''Hydro Mimic Boars''' are [[Hydro Mimics]] summoned by the [[Oceanid]], but can also be encountered on their own in the [[Spiral Abyss]] or during [[Quests]]. They resemble normal [[Forest Boar]]s. They take more damage from {{Pyro}} (except in certain events; see [[#Event|below]]). The boar heals quickly under the correct conditions.

===Event===
The event version is used in [[Wishful Drops]], [[Legend of the Vagabond Sword]], and certain iterations of the [[Spiral Abyss]].
{{Enemy Stats
|hydro_res    = Immune
|hp_ratio     = 3.4
|atk_ratio    = 3
|hp_type      = 1
}}

==Abilities and Attacks==
*'''Heal:''' Every 1.5 seconds, heals itself for '''5%''' of its Max [[HP]]. The healing will be disabled for 3 seconds after being hit by a {{Pyro}} attack.
*'''Ram:''' When up close, quickly rams at the player, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Hydro DMG}} on hit.
*'''Charge:''' When far from the player, charges straight ahead at the player, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Hydro DMG}} on hit.
